NewsArticle.Title: Updates
NewsArticle.Content: Updates - Updated Skills/Spells * Updated Damage of Hail of Feathers * Supernova Shot - Increased Damage, Lower cooldown * ard deo searg - Updated to 2 line cast * ard ioc colmha - Updated to 2 line cast * Increased Regeneration - usable in Loures Battle Ring - New Rare Monster Item Drop from Dhubh Seud * Ring Item in Cthonic Remains 56 More updates to follow... Dark Ages Team
